Name: Yoimiya
Title: "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya
Desc: Captain and Vanguard of Team Naganohara for the 11th Hanamizaka Street Invitational.
Source: Reward for inviting Yoimiya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

13052.Name: Niwabi Fire-Dance
13052.Desc: This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113051]</color>. (This Skill does not grant {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy)

C113051.Name: Niwabi Enshou
C113051.Desc: The character to which this is attached has their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG, and their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K103].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C113052.Name: Aurous Blaze
C113052.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character other than $[A1305] uses a Skill:</color> Deal 1 $[K103].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
